Headline: Red Line Service Delayed in the area of 35th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains continue to stand in the area of 35th due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains continue to stand in the area of 35th due to a medical emergency on the tracks. 

Shuttle buses are available between Roosevelt and 63rd in both directions to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #21 Cermak, #18 16th/18th, #62 Archer, #55 Garfield or the #29 State.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Addison. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
